title: Create a Request for Information (RFI)
description: A contractor on site has a question about a design drawing and needs clarification from the engineering team. A formal RFI must be logged.

tasks.description: Open the RFI module and start a new request.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully initiates a new RFI.

tasks.description: Enter the details of the question, referencing the specific drawing number and section in question.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly documents the contractor's question.

tasks.description: Submit the RFI, which is then automatically routed to the lead engineer for that discipline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the RFI, and the system assigns it to the responsible engineer.
